name: APOYO POSITIVO
goal:
Apoyo Positivo is a NGO promoting DIVERSITY and giving a response to its needs in HEALTH, EDUCATION and RIGHTS since 1993.
Our organization is specialized in HIV and STIs and HRSR and is a community organization working beside patients, relatives and general public.
We work at national and local level with two main offices in Madrid and Málaga and we also participate at the European level as EATG members and also in some platform as AIDS Action Europe. Our main target communities are: HIV, hepatitis and STI patients, LGTBQI community, migrants, women, youth and drug users.
Our work is divided in three main areas:
HEALTH
- HIV and STI checkpoint / testing program
- Psychosocial support and pair program
- Residence for PLWHIV and LGTBI community
- Work and legal support program
- Chemsex and harm reduction program
- Ageing with HIV
interests: Communication, Culture, Development, Education, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
